title: Multiple Choice Question
description: Schema for q{NN}.mcq.{lang}.json — multiple-choice question files.

text.description: The question text displayed to the student.

options.description: List of answer options. Order matters — correct_index refers to position in this array.

correct_index.description: Zero-based index of the correct option. Required when allow_multiple is false.

correct_indices.description: Zero-based indices of all correct options. Required when allow_multiple is true.

allow_multiple.description: When false, exactly one option is correct (use correct_index). When true, multiple options may be correct (use correct_indices).

correct_answer.description: Human-readable correct answer text used by the AI evaluator.

explanation.description: Explanation shown to the student after submission (when show_explanations is true).

image_url.description: Optional image URL displayed alongside the question.

ai_context.description: Additional context sent to the AI evaluator for this question.

ai_suggestions.description: Pre-authored AI suggestions with associated scores.

text.description: Suggestion text shown to the student.
